toolcards.name: Grozing Pliers
toolcards.description: After drafting, increase or decrease the value of the drafted die by 1. 1 may not change to 6, or 6 to 1.

toolcards.name: Eglomise Brush
toolcards.description: Move any one die in your window ignoring the color restriction. You must obey all other placement restriction.

toolcards.name: Copper Foil Burnisher
toolcards.description: Move any one die in your window ignoring shade restriction. You must obey all other placement restriction.

toolcards.name: Lathekin
toolcards.description: Move exactly two dice, obeying all placement restrictions

toolcards.name: Lens Cutter
toolcards.description: After drafting, swap the drafted die with a die from Round Track

toolcards.name: Flux Brush
toolcards.description: After drafting, re-roll the drafted die. If it cannot be placed, return it to the draft pool

toolcards.name: Glazing Hammer
toolcards.description: Re-roll all dice in the Draft Pool. This may be used on your second turn before drafting

toolcards.name: Running Pliers
toolcards.description: After your first turn, immediately draft a die. Skip your next turn this round

toolcards.name: Cork-backed Straightedge
toolcards.description: After drafting, place the die in a spot that is not adjacent to another die. You must obey all other placement restrictions

toolcards.name: Grinding Stone
toolcards.description: After drafting, flip the die to its opposite side. 6 flip to 1, 5 to 2, 4 to 3, etc

toolcards.name: Flux Remover
toolcards.description: After drafting, return the die to the Dice Bag and pull 1 die  from the dice bag. Choose a value and place the new die, obeying all placement restrictions, or return it to the Draft Pool

toolcards.name: Tap Wheel
toolcards.description: Move up to two dice of the same color that match the color of a die on the Round Track. You must obey all placement restrictions

privateobjectives.name: Shades of Red - Private
privateobjectives.description: Som of values on red dice

privateobjectives.name: Shades of Yellow - Private
privateobjectives.description: Som of values on yellow dice

privateobjectives.name: Shades of Green - Private
privateobjectives.description: Som of values on green dice

privateobjectives.name: Shades of Blue - Private
privateobjectives.description: Som of values on blue dice

privateobjectives.name: Shades of Purple - Private
privateobjectives.description: Som of values on purple dice
